name: Mascotas castradas
query:
SELECT 
    an.name AS "ID Mascota",
    an.nombre AS "Nombre de la Mascota", 
    an.especie AS "Especie", 
    an.raza AS "Raza", 
    an.sexo AS "Sexo",
    d.name AS "ID Dueño",
    d.nombre AS "Nombre del Dueño", 
    d.apellido AS "Apellido del Dueño", 
    d.telefono AS "Teléfono",
    d.tipo_documento AS "Tipo de Documento del Dueño",
    d.numero_documento AS "Documento del Dueño",
    a.ingreso AS "Última Fecha de Castración",
    v.name AS "ID Veterinario",
    p.nombre AS "Nombre del Veterinario",
    p.apellido AS "Apellido del Veterinario",
    p.numero_documento AS "Documento del Veterinario"
FROM (
    SELECT 
        *,
        ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY parent ORDER BY ingreso DESC) AS rn
    FROM 
        `tabAtencion`
    WHERE 
        tipo = 'Castración'
) AS a
JOIN `tabAnimal` AS an ON a.parent = an.name
LEFT JOIN `tabDueno` AS d ON an.documento_dueno = d.numero_documento
LEFT JOIN `tabVeterinario` AS v ON a.veterinario = v.name
LEFT JOIN `tabPersona` AS p ON p.numero_documento = v.persona
WHERE a.rn = 1
ORDER BY a.ingreso DESC;
